forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 18C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 63F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low around 10C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 49F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 18C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 63F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 62F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain transitioning to a few showers in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 20C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 68F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 11C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 51F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 21C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 69F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High near 20C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 67F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 19C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 66F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 19C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 66F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 51F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 19C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 66F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low near 10C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low around 50F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.
